channel.title: Comments on: 10 Best Ethereum (ETH) wallets of 2020

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Great read. Atomicwallet is my best Wallet for sotfware while I like Trezor for Hardware wallets
item.content:encoded:
Great read.
Atomicwallet is my best Wallet for sotfware while I like Trezor for Hardware wallets

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Atomicwallet is my best non-custodial wallet because it houses over 500 Cryptos and I earn while holding some of this cryptos
item.content:encoded: Atomicwallet is my best non-custodial wallet because it houses over 500 Cryptos and I earn while holding some of this cryptos

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description:
You mentioned nice wallets but I must say Atomic Wallet is the only one I have heard of and used. Maybe I have seen people talk about Trezor but not used it before.
I guess Atomic is my best. Nice Article though!
item.content:encoded:
You mentioned nice wallets but I must say Atomic Wallet is the only one I have heard of and used. Maybe I have seen people talk about Trezor but not used it before.

I guess Atomic is my best.
Nice Article though!

item.title: By: shariful
item.dc:creator: shariful
item.description: for keeping eth atomic wallet is the best imo. still anybody needs more more wallet to try out. probably best article and recommend wallet to check.
item.content:encoded: for keeping eth atomic wallet is the best imo. still anybody needs more more wallet to try out. probably best article and recommend wallet to check.

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: There are so many wallets to store ethereum but I would recommend one in which we can access the private keys and Atomic Wallet is one of them.
item.content:encoded: There are so many wallets to store ethereum but I would recommend one in which we can access the private keys and Atomic Wallet is one of them.
